sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import styled from 'styled-components';

const StyledInputAndSubmitField = styled.div`
  width: 80%
  max-width: 320px
  border-radius: 5px
  background-color: $white
  overflow: hidden
  input {
    border: none
		padding: 10px 15px
		font: small-caption
		+font-size(1.8)
		width: calc(100% - 50px)
		color: $dark-blue-light
		outline: none
		line-height: 1.5
  }
  div {
    position: relative
		display: inline
		float: right
		+size(50px, 50px)
		background-color: $dark-blue-light
		transition: background-color .25s ease-out
		cursor: pointer
		+font-size(2.6)
		position: absolute
		top: 11px
		right: 12px
		color: #ccc
		transition: color .25s ease-out
		&:hover
		transition: background-color .25s ease-out
		background-color: $dark-blue-heavy
  }
`

const InputAndSubmitField = props => {
  return(
    <StyledInputAndSubmitField>
      <input placeholder={props.placeholder} default='input name' type="text" value={props.default} onChange={props.setName} />
      <button type="submit" onClick={e => {

        e.preventDefault();
      }} />
    </StyledInputAndSubmitField>
  )
}

export default InputAndSubmitField;
